message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $110. It's a great value considering its worth to us is $120 and its high value to you at $100.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $105.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. To continue our negotiation, I propose a price of $108 for the product. This reflects the value we place on it while still being competitive with your valuation.
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. I would like to counteroffer at $106.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value we place on our product and your valuation, I am willing to accept a price of $107 for the product. This represents a fair compromise between our positions.
